alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 8:13AM CST until February 04 at 1:12PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River At West affecting Holmes and Attala Counties. Big Black River Near Bovina affecting Hinds and Warren Counties. Big Black River Near Bentonia affecting Yazoo and Madison Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River at West. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Thousands of acres of agricultural land are under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 18.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Saturday evening and continue falling to 14.1 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Big Black River West 15.0 18.7 Tue 7 am CST 18.1 17.6 17.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 1000 PM CST.
